description.value: Complex actuators and servos are installed in your knees, giving you the power to make impressive leaps. You always count as having a running start when attempting Athletics checks to jump. In addition, you don’t fall @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.XeRGqHVtcZ7vsgJ0]{Prone} if you fail an Athletics check to jump by 5 or more. Finally, the damage you take from the first 10 feet of a fall is converted into nonlethal damage, even if you aren’t falling onto a yielding surface.
